title: Lentil and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['100g brown lentils', '100g red lentils', '1 litre water', '2 potatoes, peeled and quartered', '1 stick celery, finely chopped', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons chicken stock granules', '3 whole cloves', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper']
